br.ufmg.lcc.arangitester.interceptors
Interface LccIInterceptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
LccLoggerImpl
public interface LccIInterceptor

Action when a custom annotation is on a method invoked. To register annotation with the interceptor user registerInterceptor on LccContext

Author:
Lucas Gonçalves
